channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. stocks end lower to snap postelection rally as Wall Street awaits CPI data
Trump's tariff threats send corporate America scrambling for lobbyists and loopholes
item.description: Donald Trump campaigned on hardline tariff proposals that alarmed economists, corporate America and Wall Street.

item.title: Exxon CEO says Trump won’t be able to ‘unleash’ new energy production
DEI efforts are critical to the U.S. economy because ‘there’s not enough white men,’ John Hope Bryant says
item.description: The U.S. can’t remain the leading global economy if it doesn’t let its citizens become financially stable.

item.title: How Tesla can thrive in a Trump administration
The Federal Reserve is trimming rates, and these higher-yielding assets could be called back soon
item.description: Investors may be paid a little more interest for buying brokered CDs with call provisions, but the high-yield bonanza may be coming to an end soon.

item.title: AARP’s new CEO vows to protect Social Security, Medicare, and ensure older adults age ‘on their own terms’
item.description: Her top priorities also include pushing for financial support for caregivers.

item.title: Glassdoor CEO talks about the hottest jobs in the AI boom—and the one job he thinks is phasing out
item.description: Data scientists and engineers are in, copy writing is out.

item.title: Joshua Kushner: Why I bet $1.3 billion on OpenAI
item.description: Joshua Kushner said at Fortune’s Global Forum there were two main reasons.

item.title: When will this Trump-fueled bull market approach bubble territory? Watch this indicator
item.description: Traders and investors alike should watch to see where Wall Street's fear gauge goes next.

item.title: Rivian-Volkswagen joint venture up deal to $5.8 billion, VW cars expected as early as 2027
item.description: The companies said the deal is now up to $5.8 billion – up from $5 billion – with the first VW models to use Rivian's software and electrical architec...

item.title: Sticky inflation might make it more tricky for Fed rate cuts, CPI could show
Tom Brady’s key to success: ‘To me, failure is amazing’
item.description: Hard lessons as a benchwarmer and sixth-round draft pick fuelled the career of a 7-time Super Bowl winner.

item.title: 23andMe says there’s substantial doubt it can stay in business
FAA bans U.S.-Haiti flights for 30 days after Spirit Airlines flight struck by gunfire
item.description: A Spirit Airlines plane was struck by gunfire as it was trying to land at Port-au-Prince airport.
